short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables editing of text fields with Monaco Editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your text editing experience within your browser with the Monaco TextField Editor extension. Transform any text field on the web into a powerful code editor, bringing the best features of the Monaco Editor directly to you.

Key Features:

- Advanced text editing in text fields and textareas using the Monaco Editor.
- Support for syntax highlighting across a variety of languages including JSON, JavaScript, Python and more.
- Seamless integration with a right-click context menu option for editable text areas.
- Convenient keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+M or Command+M) to open the Monaco Editor on the focused text element.
- Save your edits directly back to the webpage with easy save mechanisms.

Usage:

Simply right-click on any editable text field on a website and select "Edit with Monaco Textfield Editor" from the context menu to open the Monaco Editor. You can also activate the editor for the current text field by using the keyboard shortcut. After making changes, click "SAVE" or press Ctrl+S to apply your updates to the page.

This Chrome extension is perfect for developers, content creators, and anyone who desires an enriched text editing tool while browsing online.
